name: Studio 316
description:
Hello! We’re so excited to welcome you to Studio 316!

Hopefully you’ve had a chance to tour our wonderful facilities during your application process, but I’d love to tell you even more about the state of the art studio you’ll soon be able to spend an eternity exploring!

Where do I even start?! Who likes music?

Awesome! Prepare to be amazed by our top of the line audiophile grade speaker equipment that features in every device that makes a noise! There’s no skimping on quality here.

For guest’s viewing pleasure, we have best in class screen technology too! Not 4k. Not 8k. Not even 16k. I’ve been made to believe that every screen here is 32k resolution and microphone and camera compatible - so watch what you say!

Our lower floors provide luxurious residential suites with great space to unwind and relax, amenity filled communal spaces to meet other guests and socialise, complimentary food and drink services, fully fitted recreational facilities, and ample storage space. You’ll never want to leave!

Here at Studio 316 you’ll always be safe under the watchful eye of the studio’s very own Moderation Team™ - the security detail that literally never misses a thing. Better yet, you won’t even know they’re watching so you can enjoy your time here peacefully!

Situated in the heart and soul of the picturesque Down Down Under, we just know this is the destination for you!

Welcome to Studio 316. Welcome…to paradise!

                                    -- Studio 316 Tour Committee

Welcome to the basement of Studio 316, the premier Down Down Under destination for live and VOD content. In WhaleCubed's debut game, you'll be able to explore the basement, find hidden lore, and discover what life is really like down there. Featuring all of your favourite things about dark, moist, decrepit spaces filled with people that have no way out of said spaces, like the mod room and snacks (check expiry date, we aren't held responsible if you don't)!

 Will you be able to solve the puzzles and find the way out, or will you join the rest of the basement dwellers for a life of "comfort"?

Installation Instructions:

1. Unzip the downloaded file

2. Run Studio316.exe
